attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to put pressure on the Chinese to stop this barbaric pointless and cruel event, If the Chinese want our business then they need to stop these types of actions, If the western world boycotted all products from China they would soon listen.

Lets all put an end to this disgusting festival, Please spread this on Twitter and Facebook.


http://news.sky.com/story/1105791/dog-meat-festival-goes-ahead-despite-protest
